## orCommaConditions() function

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

ORs given conditions that determine if a comma is necessary.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function orCommaConditions(...conditions: string[]): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  conditions | string\[\] |  |

**Returns:**

string

"true" if `conditions` includes any "true". "false" if `conditions` is empty.

## Remarks

Encloses individual items in `conditions` in parenthesis "()" and concatenates them with " \|\| " unless `conditions` has only one item.

Drops any "false" in `conditions`<!-- -->.
